ygData.subject: Problems following links with quotes?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi there, I m having a problem getting Heritrix to follow links with quotes in them. Typically these links are of the format

Subject: Problems following links with quotes?

Hi there,

I'm having a problem getting Heritrix to follow links with quote=
s in them.

Typically these links are of the format 

http://foo.org/testin=
g/person%27s-stuff

Where %27 equates to single quote (').  When I see this=
 in the logs,
it comes out as

http://foo.org/testing/person&

So my theory=
 is that somewhere in the processor queue, something
(either my code or Her=
itrix) is turning this into ", and then
something else is looking for =
& as query parameter and truncating it.

Has anyone else run into this befo=
re?  Any idea where I should look?

Will.
